verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
Highest praises - Highest praises,
Highest praises with great
Joy we bring to Thee.
On the cross in agony
Thou didst give Thy life for me.
Highest praises with great joy we bring to Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Highest praises - Highest praises
Highest praises
With great joy I bring to Thee
From a place of lowly birth
Thou dost reign o'er heav'n and earth
Highest praises
With great joy I bring to Thee

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thou art worthy - Thou art worthy
Thou art worthy
To receive our deepest love
On the cross of Calvary
Thou hast won the victory
Thou art worthy
To receive our deepest love

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Halleluja - Hallelujah
Glory now and evermore be unto Thee
On the throne of majesty
Thou art Lord eternally
Glory now and evermore be unto Thee
